body_html: @jhseu It should be possible in the next week or two. The current layering is bit more intricate than that, but a couple of changes in flight will enable us to remove the current dependency on core/common_runtime and allow building DatasetOpKernel and DatasetBase subclasses in a separate shared library.
body_text: @jhseu It should be possible in the next week or two. The current layering is bit more intricate than that, but a couple of changes in flight will enable us to remove the current dependency on core/common_runtime and allow building DatasetOpKernel and DatasetBase subclasses in a separate shared library.
body: @jhseu It should be possible in the next week or two. The current layering is bit more intricate than that, but a couple of changes in flight will enable us to remove the current dependency on `core/common_runtime` and allow building `DatasetOpKernel` and `DatasetBase` subclasses in a separate shared library.
